title: How has paint improved over the decades, with technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Industrial coatings have improved dramatically over the last two centuries or so. From the introduction of phenolic resins to advanced polymers and all sorts of other material science advances there are things we can do with paint that are impossible with naturally occurring products and their early derivatives. House paint has actually deteriorated somewhat in quality though. This has come along with a substantial increase in safety and convenience so it’s been on balance a good trade off. Oil based media and lead pigments are generally more lustrous and durable than latex and acrylic media and other pigments and hues, but the oils are more difficult to use and more of an environmental problem, and lead is toxic.
